cab.content: 19SECRET.BATTLE SITUATION -MING - 4th APRIL, 1916*On the British front there has been no change.2. At 5.30 a.m. this morning the French line from KAN OA REto- GRIVESNES was bombarded heavily, and an attack was launchedby the enemy against GRIVESITES, but no news has yet beenreceived as to the result.General Staff. STar Office.4th April, 1918.Issued at 12.25 p.m.
